item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }
Biography I get to work with lots of amazing people who are all doing really fascinating things.

item.title: Posters
item.description: Here are my conference posters, in case you’d like to take a look: A False Growth Mindset May Increase Victim-Blaming, poster presented at the 2019 Intervention Preconference of the Society of Personality and Social Psychology, Portland, OR Higher Population Density, Lower Meaning in Life, poster presented at the 2018 meeting of the Society of Personality and Social Psychology, San Francisco, CA Cultural Differences in the Enjoyment of Thought, poster presented at the 2017 meeting of the Society of Personality and Social Psychology, San Antonio, TX A Historical Shift in the Moral Foundations of Public Persuasion, poster presented at the 2016 meeting of the Society of Personality and Social Psychology, San Diego, CA
